natural solution: We successively expand by multiplying binomials: \begin{align} (a&-1)(a+1)(a+2) - (a-2)(a+1)\\ &= (a^2-1)(a+2)-(a-2)(a+1)\\ &= (a^3 + 2a^2 - a - 2) - (a^2 -a -2)\\ &= a^3 + a^2. \end{align}So our answer is just $\boxed{a^3 + a^2}$.
